definition: the act of arranging and adapting a piece of music
details:
noun
- the act of arranging and adapting a piece of music
= synonyms: transcription
- the spatial property of the way in which something is placed
= example: the spatial property of the way in which something is placed
= synonyms: placement
- an organized structure for arranging or classifying
= example: an organized structure for arranging or classifying
= synonyms: organization, organisation
- the thing arranged or agreed to
= example: the thing arranged or agreed to
= synonyms: agreement
- a piece of music that has been adapted for performance by a particular set of voices or instruments
= synonyms: musical arrangement
- an orderly grouping (of things or persons) considered as a unit
